artist: Designer: In the style of Koloman Moser; Manufacturer: August Ungethüm Kunstmöbelfabrik
description: dark wood finish; front has six drawers at center with drawer pulls that lie flat; larger doors on either side; two pull-out extenders above each door; front left and right sides decorated with golden brown inlay with squared-off designs of grapes on stylized stem with square stylized leaves; tan, cream, and grey marble top; rectangular mirror
medium: Palisander, satinwood, mirror glass, marble, nickel plated mounts
title: Dining room sideboard
